title: Colombia’s Supreme Court picks new chief prosecutor
description:
Colombia’s Supreme Court picked a new chief prosecutor from a presidential shortlist surrendered in September last year. Luz Adriana Camargo will replace acting Prosecutor General Martha Mancera, who temporarily took…

title: Colombia’s acting chief prosecutor quietly signs off on major reform
description:
Colombia’s acting chief prosecutor Martha Mancera signed off on a bulk of possibly illegal resolutions that severely reduce the powers of her successor. The resolutions were made public while the…
